name: Pacman (Gef)
description:
A game i did as a test to enter a company in November of 2019 .

You recieved a broken/incomplete project and you had a month to fix it. This is a polished version of what i sent.(Original deliver the sprites were different , had no sound[cause it was specified you didn't have to implement them] and was missing transitions).

Juego que hice como prueba para entrar en una compañia en Noviembre de 2019.

Recibias un proyecto roto/incompleto que tenias que arreglar en un mes. Esta es una version pulida de lo que envie.(El original los sprites eran diferentes,no tenia sonido[estaba especificado que no tenias que implementarlos] y le faltaban transiciones).
